Color Palette

Usage Guidelines

Each color from the brand color palette is available as a variable when building Apollo UI with SCSS. Below are all the available shades for each color, including the variable name and value for each.

Primary Colors

$atmosphere
#32b5fc
$atmosphere-25
#ccecfe
$atmosphere-50
#98dafd
$atmosphere-125
#2688bd
$atmosphere-150
#195b7e
$atmosphere-175
#0d2d3f
$blue
#297dfd
$blue-25
#c9defe
$blue-50
#94befe
$blue-125
#1f5ebe
$blue-150
#153f7f
$blue-175
#0a1f3f

#37dad3
$teal-25
#cdf6f4
$teal-50

$teal-125
#29a49e

$teal-175
